attributes.action: To prevent/stop Tony Blair from becoming president of the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: He destroyed Great Britian and has a huge tendency to lie. He has hidden the truth and will do it again and for this reason he is not fit to hold this position should it come to exist.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
